thread.section_title: Villa Opera Drouot - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel, Great Area, Great Service
thread.title_full: Great Hotel, Great Area, Great Service - Review of Villa Opera Drouot, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ismael B
title: Great Hotel, Great Area, Great Service
text: The staff were friendly and helpful and the rooms were clean. A great spot that is walking distance to most attractions. Great value for money. and I would definitely stay there again. My only issue (and this is probably my fault) was that I was unaware that breakfast does not come included in the price of the room and it's an extra 15 euros per day.
